channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These are the best new hotels that opened in 2025
item.description: From New York City to Prague, from Cape Town to Taipei, these are the best new hotels that opened in 2025, according to The Points Guy's team of trave...

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred cardholders: Why the Venture X is worth adding next
item.description: Learn how you can maximize your travel rewards by pairing the Capital One Venture X and the Chase Sapphire Preferred.

item.title: An exciting new points hotel in Argentina's capital: The Recoleta Grand
item.description: The Recoleta Grand is an exciting new Autograph Collection hotel in Buenos Aires, Argentina, where you can earn and redeem Marriott Bonvoy points.

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred vs. Amex Gold: Which mid-tier favorite is right for you?
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred and Amex Gold are two of the top travel credit cards. We put them head to head so you can pick which is better for you.

item.title: What it was like on Amtrak's new Acela 'NexGen' trains
item.description: We tested out first and business-class on Amtrak's new NextGen train.
